titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony and representation of a former employee of the Senate in Sonja I. Anderson v. Kaiser Engineers Hanford Co.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/23/1994--Introduced. Authorizes Robert Alvarez, a former employee of the Senate, to testify in the case of Sonja I. Anderson v. Kaiser Engineers Hanford Co., and any related proceedings, except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent him.
